plt.dataset.preprocessing

Class ZScore

  • java.lang.Object
    • plt.dataset.preprocessing.PreprocessingOperation
      • plt.dataset.preprocessing.ZScore

  • public class ZScore
extends PreprocessingOperation
    Transforms the values of a feature to have average equal to zero and standard deviation equal to one
    Author:
    Vincent Farrugia, Luca Querella
